    • Method Detail

      • PreInit

        public void PreInit(DLPreInitEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: IEventListener
        During the PreInit phase of startup, after all mods have been discovered, The ModRegistry executes this event on the mod the registry is attempting to load. All commands must be registered on this event being called in your mod.
        Specified by:
        PreInit in interface IEventListener
        Overrides:
        PreInit in class EventListenerAdapter

      • Ready

        public void Ready(DiscLoader loader)
        Description copied from interface: IEventListener
        Emitted when all guilds are available, and all members in non-large guilds are cached.
        Specified by:
        Ready in interface IEventListener
        Overrides:
        Ready in class EventListenerAdapter
        Parameters:
        loader - The current instance of DiscLoader
